description: NeonAlert is a component for presenting temporary notifications to the user. Place the component once inside your app and use NeonAlertService to send events to the component.

props.name: dismissible
props.description: Whether alert messages are dismissible by clicking on them. This can also be set per alert message.

props.name: duration
props.description:
Duration to display messages before removing them. This can also be set per alert message. Set the duration to 0 to
disable the duration timer, NOTE: this requires the user to dismiss the alert by clicking on it.
